title: Tested: Satechi’s new Pro Hub Max delivers ample I/O in a made-for-M1 Pro MacBook design
content:
Satechi just launched its new Pro Hub Max earlier in the year, delivering one of the first USB-C adapters made for Apple’s latest M1 Pro MacBooks. Now after putting it to the test with one of the new Apple Silicon machines, our latest Tested with 9to5Toys review reports on whether the Apple-friendly design is .

more…

The post Tested: Satechi’s new Pro Hub Max delivers ample I/O in a made-for-M1 Pro MacBook design appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Satechi Pro Hub Max arrives with a made for M1 Pro MacBook Pro design thanks to an aluminum exterior and 8-in-2 form-factor
